verses.verse: לְדָוִ֡ד <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David אֵ֘לֶ֤יךָ <WH413> to יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> O LORD אֶקְרָ֗א <WH7121> Unto thee will I cry צוּרִי֮ <WH6697> my rock אַֽל־ <WH408> not תֶּחֱרַ֪שׁ <WH2790> to me lest [if] thou be silent מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי <WH4480> at פֶּן־ <WH6435> do תֶּֽחֱשֶׁ֥ה <WH2790> not be deaf מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> at וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי <WH4911> to me I become עִם־ <WH5973> who י֥וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> like them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <WH953> into the pit

שְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> Hear ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice תַּ֭חֲנוּנַי <WH8469> of my supplications בְּשַׁוְּעִ֣י <WH7768> when I cry אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> toward בְּנָשְׂאִ֥י <WH5375> unto thee when I lift up יָ֝דַ֗י <WH3027> my hands אֶל־ <WH413> toward דְּבִ֥יר <WH1687> oracle קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH6944> toward thy holy

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּמְשְׁכֵ֣נִי <WH4900> Draw me not away עִם־ <WH5973> with רְשָׁעִים֮ <WH7563> with the wicked וְעִם־ <WH5973> who פֹּ֪עֲלֵ֫י <WH6466> and with the workers אָ֥וֶן <WH205> of iniquity דֹּבְרֵ֣י <WH1696> which speak שָׁ֭לוֹם <WH7965> peace עִם־ <WH5973> with רֵֽעֵיהֶ֑ם <WH7453> to their neighbours וְ֝רָעָ֗ה <WH7451> but mischief בִּלְבָבָֽם׃ <WH3824> [is] in their hearts

תֶּן־ <WH5414> Give לָהֶ֣ם <WH1992> according כְּפָעֳלָם֮ <WH6467> them according to their deeds וּכְרֹ֪עַ <WH7455> and according to the wickedness מַֽעַלְלֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <WH4611> of their endeavours כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> them after the work יְ֭דֵיהֶם <WH3027> of their hands תֵּ֣ן <WH5414> give לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like הָשֵׁ֖ב <WH7725> render גְּמוּלָ֣ם <WH1576> to them their desert לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because לֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor יָבִ֡ינוּ <WH995> Because they regard אֶל־ <WH413> about פְּעֻלֹּ֣ת <WH6468> not the works יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶל־ <WH413> about מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> nor the operation יָדָ֑יו <WH3027> of his hands יֶ֝הֶרְסֵ֗ם <WH2040> he shall destroy וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יִבְנֵֽם׃ <WH1129> them and not build them up
בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [be] the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> Because שָׁ֝מַע <WH8085> because he hath heard ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <WH8469> of my supplications

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD עֻזִּ֥י <WH5797> [is] my strength וּמָגִנִּי֮ <WH4043> and my shield בּ֤וֹ בָטַ֥ח <WH982> trusted לִבִּ֗י <WH3820> my heart וְֽנֶ֫עֱזָ֥רְתִּי <WH5826> in him and I am helped וַיַּעֲלֹ֥ז <WH5937> greatly rejoiceth לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> therefore my heart וּֽמִשִּׁירִ֥י <WH7892> and with my song אֲהוֹדֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH3034> will I praise
יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD עֹֽז־ <WH5797> [is] their strength לָ֑מוֹ וּמָ֘ע֤וֹז <WH4581> strength יְשׁוּע֖וֹת <WH3444> and he [is] the saving מְשִׁיח֣וֹ <WH4899> of his anointed הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

הוֹשִׁ֤יעָה ׀ <WH3467> Save אֶת־ <WH853> עַמֶּ֗ךָ <WH5971> thy people וּבָרֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> and bless אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ <WH5159> thine inheritance וּֽרְעֵ֥ם <WH7462> feed וְ֝נַשְּׂאֵ֗ם <WH5375> them also and lift them up עַד־ <WH5704> for הָעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever
